game.shortDescription: Last Drop is a story you need to experience. Welcome to Nykylä Finland 1994. Seppo Sahtivaara and friends are waiting for you. This is an openworld action game with a story that has an impact. We bring back old good games and action from the best movies from that era. We want you to enjoy!
